title: Ep: 007 - Crafting Spaces that Evoke Feeling and Emotion
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography, we sit down for a conversation with Interior Designer Jennifer Morrison of Morrison Design House. Jennifer is an avid runner, cook, beekeeper, and book collector that approaches interior design from a technological and nature-based point of view. Drawing inspiration from the location of a residence and surrounding landscape, she is able to craft spaces that evoke feeling and emotion to better convey a sense of home.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
